description:
The fan-favorite Fantastic Four villain Doctor Doom is set to make his Marvel Cinematic Universe debut in Avengers: Doomsday. What’s been so interesting about this announcement, however, is that actor Robert Downey Jr. will be portraying the character. Now a new rumor for Avengers: Doomsday may explain how Robert Downey Jr. is playing Doctor Doom [...]

The post ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ Rumor May Explain How Robert Downey Jr. Is Doctor Doom appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ Rumor May Explain How Robert Downey Jr. Is Doctor Doom

description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe is still growing with many superheroes and supervillains being set up to appear. Fans have their own cast members in mind to play these characters, however, including major celebrity Jenna Ortega. With that in mind, Jenna Ortega reminds her fans that she was already in the MCU. The post Jenna Ortega Reminds Marvel Fans She Was Already In The MCU appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Jenna Ortega Reminds Marvel Fans She Was Already In The MCU
